title: Inside Europe 04.08.2022
description: Security expert William Alberque on nuclear threats and Ukraine, Turkey expects payback for brokering Ukrainian grain deal, and England’s lionesses win the Euro Championships. Also: Russia’s war with Ukraine awakens traumatic memories for Estonians, how low water levels in the river Rhine are contributing to rising prices and a look at the human toll of the cost of living crisis.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Kate Laycock, William Alberque, nuclear, Ukraine, football, Estonia
